GSP30bhairstu:2: tvanmayam etad aśeṣam idānīṃ bhāti mama tvadanugrahaśaktyā /
GSP30bhairstu:3: tvaṃ ca maheśa sadaiva mamātmā svātmamayaṃ mama tena samastam // 2 //
GSP30bhairstu:4: svātmani viśvagaye tvayi nāthe tena na saṃsṛtibhītikathāsti /
GSP30bhairstu:6: antaka māṃ prati mā dṛśam enāṃ krodhakarālatamāṃ vinidhehi /
GSP30bhairstu:9: mṛtyuyamāntakakarmapiśācair nātha namo 'stu na jātu bibhemi // 5 //
GSP30bhairstu:11: bhāvaparāmṛtanirbharapūrṇe tvayy aham ātmani nirvṛtim emi // 6 //
GSP30bhairstu:16: nṛtyati gāyati hṛṣyati gāḍhaṃ saṃvid iyaṃ mama bhairavanātha /
GSP30bhairstu:17: tvāṃ priyam āpya sudarśanam ekaṃ durlabham anyajanaiḥ samayajñam // 9 /= /
GSP30bhairstu:18: vasurasapauṣe kṛṣṇadaśamyām abhinavaguptaḥ stavam imam akarot /
GSP30bhairstu:19: yena vibhur bhavamarusantāpaṃ śamayati janasya jhaṭiti dayāluḥ //
